component.name: Progressive
component.summary: A simple Progress tracker for video-series and other tasks

description.p: A simple, open-source TODO list and progress tracker for Windows and linux. Built with love using Tauri and Svelte.
Create a simple tasklist, add sub-tasks and tasks with progress. See the overall progress you have accomplished.

ul.li: Removed old ffmpeg dependency code
Fixed issue in linux where you couldn't see the checkboxes
Renamed app to "progressive"
For windows users, there's been no changes, this was a simple release to prepare the app for the linux release.
Small fix where the logo when the application runs was not animated
Fixed an issue where updates were not being detected at all!
Fixed issue where it could not open files made from before 2.0.0
Updated welcome screen UI
Fixed "new file from directory"
Removed need for ffmpeg to be installed and in path for the app to work
Added new type of tasks; slider tasks
Added signed automatic updates
Greatly improved UI
The executable file is now called "Progress Tracker" instead of "progress tracker"
Various visual bugs
Non-existing items in "recently used" now display an error message
Configuration can now be "unset"
Removed visual bug where all progress bars would reset after changing just one
Menu button to fold all tasks
Shortcuts for some menu options
Themes and labels
Custom themes
Recently used now works
Made checkmarks look like the logo of the app
Added sorting options for childful tasks
Fixed bug where tasks would lose their natural sorting when created from folder
Fixed bug where cmd windows would pop up when creating tasks from folder
Significantly improved the speed of creating tasks from a folder
Added an arrow icon for childful tasks
Added editing to the main task's title
New loading screen
Faster task from folder generator
Added configuration option to right click context menu and main task
Fixed bug where you could show the default context menu
Fixed bug where items would duplicate when renaming them
Fixed bug where main progress bar would not update itself.
Fixed bug where, after opening a file with a weight interpretation, the weight would still be displayed as a number
